channel.title: Papers on Yifan (Alvin) Jiang | 姜屹帆
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Yifan (Alvin) Jiang | 姜屹帆

item.title: GenLARP: Enabling Immersive Live Action Role-Play through LLM-Generated Worlds and Characters
item.description: GenLARP is an AI-drive Live Action Role-Play (LARP) system that generates interactive 3D environments and characters in real time using LLMs, supporting immersive narrative role play for education and experiential learning.

item.title: EmbodiedCreate: In-Situ 3D Authoring for Analogical Learning
item.description: GenLARP is an AI-drive Live Action Role-Play (LARP) system that generates interactive 3D environments and characters in real time using LLMs, supporting immersive narrative role play for education and experiential learning.
